Name: Crafting Block World
About the game: Crafting Block World is an adventure with sandbox elements that will help you build your ideal world! ENDLESS WORLD! Explore the vast block world full of mysteries and interesting places! Endless plains, dense forest, dark caves — your adventures know no boundaries! Find a comfortable place and start building! CITY BUILDING GAMES! You are not limited in resources and can build anything from the simplest houses to huge and luxurious castles! Construction of houses, huts, castles, penthouses — embody your most insane ideas, because craft is not limited!
